```py
for book in more_books.keys():
    books[book] = more_books[book]
print(books)
```

```py
for book, price in more_books.items():
    books[book] = price
print(books)
```

```py
and_some_more = [('Fluent Python',45),('Python for Everybody',30)]
books.update(and_some_more)
print(books)
```
